name: Keepsake Quilt Toddler Size 45x60
description:
he keepsake quilt turns the boxes of baby clothes you keep stored in your basement into a piece of art that will last for generations to come.

This listing is for a custom made quilt from your child's clothes. The size of the quilt is 45x60. The buyer will send 15-20 items of clothing and i will design and create a quilt around the items using 5-8 different fabrics. Buyer can indicate which part of clothing they would like used, as well as color preferences.

This item is made to order and will take approximately 6-8 weeks to complete, once the items are received. 

The quilt in the photos is one that I made for a client. The size of quilt shown is 60x60.

How to order:
1) Purchase this listing
2) Find the clothes, blankets, bibs, ect.... that you want included, please mark any specific areas you want used please mark them with masking tape.
3) Ship them to me and I will create a one of a kind keepsake with your child's clothes.
4) The quilts take approximately 6-8 weeks to complete depending on how quickly I receive your clothes, blankets, ect..... 
5) If you are looking for something larger or smaller convo me for prices and information. 
6) please list any specific colors you do not want used


Please message me if you have any questions.

name: Trio of Zipper Bags
description:
It is no secret that I love zipper bags. Let's be honest, what is not to love. They are the perfect way to keep your bags organized and looking great. This trio comes in three great sizes: mini, small and large. You can give them  all as a gift or keep them for yourself. Fill them with treats and make a loved one's day. How you use these bags is entirely up to you. the possibilities are endless.

Bag measurements:
mini: 5.25 x 3.25"
small: 5.5 x 7"
large: 6.5 x 10"

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 4 ( moving left to right) 
1. Wild Child 
2. Fractured 
3. Precocious 
4. Stitched Together 
5. Cerebral 
6. Introverted (yellow) 
7. Wander lust (with pink) 
8. Introverted (pink) 
9. Wander lust (without pink) 
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Ashley Tote
description:
Ashely is my oldest friend. We have been friends since we were in middle school. In many ways, we are cut from the same cloth, we speak the same language, and can finish each other's sentences, but there are some subtle differences as well.  

Ashley is a prosecutor in South Texas, she needs a bag to be functional without being stuffy. This bag is sleek and stylish, with an outside zipper pocket, allowing Ashley to carry files into court without being weighed down by her bag. This tote is perfcet for the working professional, the busy mom or the frequent flier who wants to travel light.

Bag measures 11.25x 14. The handles are leather giving it a sophisticated feel.

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 ( moving left to right) 
1. Wild Child 
2. Fractured 
3. Precocious 
4. Stitched Together 
5. Cerebral 
6. Introverted (yellow) 
7. Wander lust (with pink) 
8. Introverted (pink) 
9. Wander lust (without pink) 
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Pleated Love Clutch
description:
While I am not one to wear skirts with pleats, I love love love pleats.  I swoon over the way they look and adore using them in my bags. They are structured, stylish and timeless. This clutch is my favorite bag in this collection. It's simple shape and pleats are sophisticated and classic, while the leather hand strap gives it a modern and current edge. It is perfect for a night out on the town or an afternoon movie date. It will hold your essentials without losing its shape. 

Bag measures  10 x7.25"

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5  (moving left to right) 
1. Wild Child 
2. Fractured 
3. Precocious 
4. Stitched Together 
5. Cerebral 
6. Introverted (yellow) 
7. Wander lust (with pink) 
8. Introverted (pink) 
9. Wander lust (without pink) 
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Half Moon Clutch
description:
started practicing yoga two summers ago. I was skeptical to say the least, but stepped outside my comfort zone and signed up for a "new to yoga" class. I think I was hooked from the first class. Yoga has given me a sense of peace and calm that I never knew was possible. It has helped to heal my heart and find a gentle acceptance of what is. I have made new friends and connections that will last a life time. 

Yoga is not easy. I am physically challenged each and every time I step on my mat. The pose that challenges me the most is called half-moon, but despite its difficulty, it is my absolute favorite pose. There is grace, strength and freedom expressed, but half moon can help you express whatever you want to express. When I created this clutch, I immediately thought of this pose. This clutch can be whatever you need it to be, you decide.

Bag measures 11 x7.5 "




You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right) 
1. Wild Child 
2. Fractured 
3. Precocious 
4. Stitched Together 
5. Cerebral 
6. Introverted (yellow) 
7. Wander lust (with pink) 
8. Introverted (pink) 
9. Wander lust (without pink) 
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Candace Cross Body Bag
description:
I met Candace because our kids were in the same montessori class two years ago. She is the mother of twin girls, this means that she is always holding  a little hand. She needs a bag that can carry what she wants and needs but that she can wear across her body leaving her hands available for her girls.  It should also be noted, that she has had the same cross body bag since we met. She has repeatedly dropped hints that she would like me to add a cross body bag  to my collection. So this one is for her, as well as, all those other mothers out there who want a stylish bag, but need their hands free for the small people in there lives.


Bag measures 12 x 11". it has an inset zipper and an adjustable strap so that it can be worn across the body or over your shoulder.

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right) 
1. Wild Child 
2. Fractured 
3. Precocious 
4. Stitched Together 
5. Cerebral 
6. Introverted (yellow) 
7. Wander lust (with pink) 
8. Introverted (pink) 
9. Wander lust (without pink) 
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: L Street Tote
description:
200 South L street was a grey brick house on a cornerlot. It had trees, a long driveway and a guest house that served as home to a cast of characters. It was the house where I grew up, in the heart of West Texas. It was a great house and I have many memories of time spent there. When my family and I get together we often tell stories about life in that house.

Recently, my mom requested a new tote bag. One that she could use while traveling, not too big and cumbersome but large enough to hold her kindle, scarf, water and some magazines. The result of that request was this bag. It is the subtle details that make this bag special.

You choose the main fabric and the remaining two fabrics will be chosen by the designer to create a unique one of a kind bag for you. The designer will chose the inside fabric, which will coordinate with the outside fabric used.

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right)
1. Wild Child
2. Fractured
3. Precocious
4. Stitched Together
5. Cerebral
6. Introverted (yellow)
7. Wander lust (with pink)
8. Introverted (pink)
9. Wander lust (without pink)
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Valerie Bag Large
description:
Are you tired of your makeup spilling while traveling and ruining your cosmetic bag? If you answered yes, this is the bag for you. The box travel bag is big enough to hold the toiletries and makeup you need while traveling but small enough to fit neatly in your suitcase. The inside is lined with oilcloth making spills and easy cleanup. Of course, it can be used for anything you can think of... markers, crayons, diapers, sunscreen and the list goes on and on. I named this bag after my friend Valerie, who is a makeup artist.

You may choose the outside of your fabric, however the oilcloth color and zipper color will be chosen by the designer making each Valerie bag a one of a kind piece.

Dimensions: 3"x5.5"x9"

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right)
1. Wild Child
2. Fractured
3. Precocious
4. Stitched Together
5. Cerebral
6. Introverted (yellow)
7. Wander lust (with pink)
8. Introverted (pink)
9. Wander lust (without pink)
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Austin Clutch
description:
I spent the first 23 years of my life in the state of Texas and I have spent the last 15 years in Upstate New York. I firmly believe that you can take the girl out of Texas but you cannot take Texas out of the girl. They say that everything is bigger in Texas, but this bag, while small, still packs a punch and makes a big statement.

You may choose the outside fabric for your bag but the inside fabric, zipper color and bangle color will be chosen by the designer making each Austin clutch a one of a kind piece.

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right)
1. Wild Child
2. Fractured
3. Precocious
4. Stitched Together
5. Cerebral
6. Introverted (yellow)
7. Wander lust (with pink)
8. Introverted (pink)
9. Wander lust (without pink)
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Galveston Clutch
description:
I have a connection to the ocean. The sound of the waves, the smell of the salt water and the immensity of the sea quiets my soul and brings me a peace like no other. My mother says it is because she spent hours walking the beach when I was in the womb. I was born in Galveston Texas, where my father was in medical school. I spent time on the beach with my cousins, and then later would journey from New York to Galveston to spend time with my childhood best friend. It is a place that exudes summer and a carefree attitude.

The galveston clutch embodies that feel, comfortable, simple, and free of constraints. Perfect for a day on the beach, an afternoon of shopping or a night out with friends and loved ones. The leather pieces on the bottom will vary as they are recycled pieces. The inside fabric, zipper color, and bangle color will be chosen by the designer.

Dimensions: 11"x 7" (when folded over)

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right)
1. Wild Child
2. Fractured
3. Precocious
4. Stitched Together
5. Cerebral
6. Introverted (yellow)
7. Wander lust (with pink)
8. Introverted (pink)
9. Wander lust (without pink)
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Stella Clutch
description:
Athena is a dear friend of mine. One day she asked me to design a bag that would hold her essentials: cell phone, money, keys and most importantly her lipgloss. The Stella clucth is a nod to the essentials not the clutter that finds its way into bags. Stella is Athena’s youngest daughter, who also happens to be Chace’s first crush. It should be noted that Stella and Chace are three years old.

The Stella clutch is perfect for a night on the town, to tuck into a diaper bag or my favorite, to use while traveling. The bangle that serves as a strap makes it easy to keep track of your bag.

You may choose the outside of your fabric, however the inside fabric, zipper color and bangle color will be chosen by the designer making each Stella clutch a one of a kind piece

Dimensions: 9.25"x 5.5"

You may choose from the following fabrics in picture 5 (moving left to right)
1. Wild Child
2. Fractured
3. Precocious
4. Stitched Together
5. Cerebral
6. Introverted (yellow)
7. Wander lust (with pink)
8. Introverted (pink)
9. Wander lust (without pink)
10. Introverted (grey)

Bags are made to order, please allow 7-10 days for your bag to be created with love.

name: Quote Pillow "Stop Holding Yourself Back"
description:
This embroidered quote pillow will liven up any room in your house.

The center of the pillow is hand embroidered with the following quote "Stop holding yourself back". The center is surrounded by designer fabric in a log cabin style quilt block in colors of yellow and grey. The back has an envelope style close in coordinating prints. 

The pillow cover will fit a 14x14 inch pillow form. This listing is for the cover only.
